sentences.sContent: If she continues drawing on the reserve at the current rate, she will run out of funds by 2012 – the year of her diamond jubilee.
sentences.sContent_eng: If she continues drawing on the reserve at the current rate, she will run out of funds by 2012 – the year of her diamond jubilee.
sentences.sCn: 如果她继续按目前的速度提取储备金的话，她将在2012年——她的钻石婚纪念那年——用完储备基金。
